source.name: Tokenization Impacts and Limitations
source.instructions: Consider the following statements about tokenization in blockchain technology. Select all that are true:

answers.answer: Tokenization can increase the accessibility of traditionally illiquid assets
All tokenized assets are guaranteed to have high liquidity in the market
Tokenization can potentially reduce the need for intermediaries in asset trading
Tokenized assets are completely risk-free investments
Tokenization can enable new forms of asset composability in DeFi

source.guidance: The correct options highlight key impacts of tokenization: increased accessibility to illiquid assets, potential reduction of intermediaries, and enabling new DeFi possibilities. The incorrect options address common misconceptions: tokenization doesn't guarantee high liquidity for all assets, nor does it make investments risk-free. These choices test understanding of both the benefits and limitations of tokenization.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT analyze the impacts and limitations of tokenization in blockchain technology
